```{python}

import pandas as pd
from itables import init_notebook_mode, show
import itables
itables.options.warn_on_undocumented_option = False

# Enable interactive HTML tables
init_notebook_mode(all_interactive=True)

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv("../data/processed/merged_dataset_with_continents.csv")

# Display with scrollable window and pagination
show(
    df,
    paging=True,            # page controls
    searchable=True,        # search bar
    scrollY="450px",        # << SCROLLABLE HEIGHT
    scrollX=True,           # horizontal scrolling if needed
    lengthMenu=[10, 25, 50, 100],   # rows per page options
    classes="display compact nowrap",  # clean styling
)
```
